about_the_game:
Synthetic Soul: Reset is a remaster of our first game in the series, remade in our new engine.

The game is an immersive modern life sim with in-depth robot companions.

This idea allows you to play the game your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After a Greydoll robot is sent to your front door without buying it, you start climbing the social ladder.

Climbing allows you to buy different houses you can move into, robot companions, outfits, and personality modules for your robots.

Earn money from odd jobs, daily stock trading, Real Estate, Commercial Real Estate, and purchasing multiple corporations and their upgrades.

What kind of person will you become once you truly have it all?

Discover the secret of your robot, and change the world.

content_descriptors.notes:
It's only started by the player only, no sexual acts or done without the player start them.

Including handjobs, missionary, thighjob, cowgirl, boobjob position at present.

There is no actions of extreme violence, graphic sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, or self-harm, within the game.

The only thing is the player is able to sleep with the robot before they activate it, but outside of that nothing happens

name: Synthetic Soul: Reset

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows8.1, Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Able to run 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Synthetic Soul: Reset is a remaster of our first game in the series, remade in our new engine. Discover the secret of your robot, and change the world.
